Name: West field Santa Anita
Description: A super regional indoor shopping mall in Arcadia, California adjacent to the Santa Anita Race Track.

Name: Rodeo Drive
Description: The "Rodeo Collection," a 45 store, 70,000 square foot shopping mall.

Name: The Broad museum
Description: A contemporary art museum on Grand Avenue in Downtown Los Angeles.

Name: OUE Skyspace La
Description: A makeover of the ground floor lobby as well as a separate second floor entrance for tourists, and a skylobby and exhibit hall on the 54th floor.

Name: UCSB
Description: One of America's Public Ivy universities, a designation that recognizes top public research universities in the U.S

Name: Hollywood Sign
Description: An American landmark and cultural icon overlooking Hollywood, Los Angeles, California. It is situated on Mount Lee, in the Hollywood Hills area of the Santa Monica Mountains.

Name: Staples Center
Description: A multi-purpose arena in Downtown Los Angeles. Adjacent to the L.A. Live development, it is located next to the Los Angeles Convention Center complex along Figueroa Street.
